nodemanager.io

Class GoogleDriveUploader

  • java.lang.Object
    • nodemanager.io.GoogleDriveUploader

  • public class GoogleDriveUploader
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to upload files to the google drive. We will replace this with database stuff once we actually get one.
